metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000417 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: MatrixSSL version 3.7.2 adopts a collision-prone OID comparison logicresulting in possible spoofing of OIDs (e.g. in ExtKeyUsage extension) onX.509 certificates.

criterions.comment: matrixssl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
